Class RPSLSpock

java.lang.Object
edu.cscc.RPSLSpock
public class RPSLSpock
extends java.lang.Object
RPSLSpock class for evaluating player's choice, creating computer's choice, and determining the winner

1.0
Author:
Jared Sweitzer

    • isComputerWin

      public static boolean isComputerWin​(java.lang.String c_pick, java.lang.String h_pick)
      Compares the picks of player and computer to determine winner
      Parameters:
      c_pick - computer's pick
      h_pick - player's pick
      Returns:
      true if computer wins and false if computer loses
